content: PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019What happens if CPF changes their policies which affects the current interest rates? Do you think there should be a ratio of how much you should place into CPF and keep as ready cash?1 answerAnswerBump1
